messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]  digests & messages
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/30/2004 9:41:27 AM Eastern Daylight Time, wine_2_water@yahoo.com writes: I am  kind of confused.  I tried to change to the digest version
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/30/2004 9:41:27 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
wine_2_water@... writes:

I am kind of confused. I tried to change to the digest version both here
and at unschooling basics and I am still getting every email. Then over at
unschooling basics, I clicked on NO EMAIL and I still get every message in my
inbox. it says it's been updated but it's not working. Do I need to
unsubscribe and resubscibe to make it go?<<<

No, just be patient. It usually takes a few hours to a few days.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
